11#ifndef VPX_VP8_COMMON_ENTROPYMV_H_
12#define VPX_VP8_COMMON_ENTROPYMV_H_
13
14#include "treecoder.h"
15
16#ifdef __cplusplus
17extern "C" {
18#endif
19
20enum {
21 mv_max = 1023, /* max absolute value of a MV component */
22 MVvals = (2 * mv_max) + 1, /* # possible values "" */
23 mvfp_max = 255, /* max absolute value of a full pixel MV component */
24 MVfpvals = (2 * mvfp_max) + 1, /* # possible full pixel MV values */
25
26 mvlong_width = 10, /* Large MVs have 9 bit magnitudes */
27 mvnum_short = 8, /* magnitudes 0 through 7 */
28
29 /* probability offsets for coding each MV component */
30
31 mvpis_short = 0, /* short (<= 7) vs long (>= 8) */
32 MVPsign, /* sign for non-zero */
33 MVPshort, /* 8 short values = 7-position tree */
34
35 MVPbits = MVPshort + mvnum_short - 1, /* mvlong_width long value bits */
36 MVPcount = MVPbits + mvlong_width /* (with independent probabilities) */
37};
38
39typedef struct mv_context {
40 vp8_prob prob[MVPcount]; /* often come in row, col pairs */
41} MV_CONTEXT;
42
43extern const MV_CONTEXT vp8_mv_update_probs[2], vp8_default_mv_context[2];
44
45#ifdef __cplusplus
46} // extern "C"
47#endif
48
49#endif // VPX_VP8_COMMON_ENTROPYMV_H_
50
